statements: SELECT * FROM water_usage;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM water_usage WHERE gallons_used > 100;
SELECT customer_name, usage_date FROM water_usage WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, gallons_used FROM water_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(gallons_used) AS total_gallons_used FROM water_usage GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, usage_date, gallons_used FROM water_usage WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, usage_date, gallons_used FROM water_usage WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01' AND usage_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(gallons_used) AS total_gallons_used FROM water_usage GROUP BY customer_id, customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(gallons_used) AS max_gallons_used FROM water_usage GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, usage_date, gallons_used FROM water_usage WHERE gallons_used > 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT usage_date, gallons_used FROM water_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, name, address, usage_date, gallons_used FROM customers JOIN water_usage ON customers.customer_id = water_usage.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, name, address, usage_date FROM customers JOIN water_usage ON customers.customer_id = water_usage.customer_id WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customers.name, SUM(water_usage.gallons_used) AS total_gallons_used FROM customers JOIN water_usage ON customers.customer_id = water_usage.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;
SELECT customers.name, water_usage.usage_date, water_usage.gallons_used FROM customers LEFT JOIN water_usage ON customers.customer_id = water_usage.customer_id ORDER BY water_usage.usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type FROM water_meters;
SELECT customer_id, install_date FROM water_meters;
SELECT usage_id, usage_date, gallons_used FROM water_usage;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, install_date FROM water_meters WHERE meter_type = 'Residential' ORDER BY install_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number, install_date, gallons_used FROM customers JOIN water_meters ON customers.customer_id = water_meters.customer_id JOIN water_usage ON water_meters.meter_id = water_usage.meter_id WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number, SUM(gallons_used) AS total_gallons_used FROM customers JOIN water_meters ON customers.customer_id = water_meters.customer_id JOIN water_usage ON water_meters.meter_id = water_usage.meter_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_gallons_used > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT meter_id, meter_reading FROM WaterMeters WHERE meter_reading > 100 ORDER BY meter_id;
SELECT log_id, usage_date, usage_amount FROM UsageLogs WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT bill_id, amount_due, paid_status FROM Billing WHERE amount_due > 50 ORDER BY bill_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, WaterMeters.meter_reading, UsageLogs.usage_date FROM Customers JOIN WaterMeters ON Customers.customer_id = WaterMeters.customer_id JOIN UsageLogs ON WaterMeters.meter_id = UsageLogs.meter_id;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, SUM(UsageLogs.usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM Customers JOIN WaterMeters ON Customers.customer_id = WaterMeters.customer_id JOIN UsageLogs ON WaterMeters.meter_id = UsageLogs.meter_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_name;

SELECT Billing.bill_id, Customers.customer_name, Billing.amount_due, Billing.paid_status FROM Customers JOIN WaterMeters ON Customers.customer_id = WaterMeters.customer_id JOIN UsageLogs ON WaterMeters.meter_id = UsageLogs.meter_id JOIN Billing ON UsageLogs.log_id = Billing.log_id WHERE Billing.paid_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type FROM water_meters WHERE meter_type = 'Residential';
SELECT usage_id, usage_date, usage_amount FROM water_usage ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT billing_id, customer_id, amount_due FROM billing_records WHERE amount_due > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, meter_type, meter_location FROM customers JOIN water_meters ON customers.customer_id = water_meters.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, usage_date, usage_amount FROM customers JOIN water_meters ON customers.customer_id = water_meters.customer_id JOIN water_usage ON water_meters.meter_id = water_usage.meter_id;
SELECT customer_name, billing_date, amount_due FROM customers JOIN billing_records ON customers.customer_id = billing_records.customer_id;
